markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Grave's Voice](/Feats.aspx?ID=2278) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight](/Sources.aspx?ID=71) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=88)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2277)

</column>

---

You can use your choice of [Spirit Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) or Haunt Lore to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) or [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) things of [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures. At the GM's discretion, an incorporeal [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=149) might be willing to hear you out.
name: Grave's Voice

</summary>
summary: You can influence spirits and haunts
